main event: A white, meteor-shaped object was observed arched down and exploded in Sao Paulo, Brazil on May 9, 1952.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 3 seconds., The object was described as white in color., There was a possibility that the sighting was of a balloon or meteor., This incident is part of a series of sightings being investigated at George AFB., The balloon burst was tracked and could correlate to this sighting.
